error.message: Using an "if" condition on "for" tag in "themes/contrib/belgrade/templates/commerce/commerce-coupon-redemption-form.html.twig" at line 26 is deprecated since Twig 2.10.0, use a "filter" filter or an "if" condition inside the "for" body instead (if your condition depends on a variable updated inside the loop).
